General.Name: Metal Energy Corp
General.Description: Metal Energy Corp. engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral properties in Canada. It explores for nickel and copper deposits, as well as platinum group elements. The company's flagship project is the Manibridge project that comprises approximately 4,368 hectares located in Manitoba on the Thompson Belt. Metal Energy Corp. is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 55 University Avenue, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5J 2H7
